panama ale yathra kala nohaki wishala parimanaye nauka himi samagam thula da eeta wada honda wikalpayak gana apeksha thibini.panama hi bhanda ha magi prawahanaya pilibanda wishesha komasariswaraya â€œsayantifik amerikanâ€ sangarawe 1912 nowambar 9 wani dina liyana lada lipiyaka panama ala idikirimen amerikanu aarthikayata saha aarakshawata salasena prathilabha pilibanda penwa di aththe amerikanu nawika hamudawe karyakshamathawa ha praharaka balaya da in shakthimath wanu athayi sandahan karamini.panama ala nila washayen wiwrutha wuye 1914 agosthu 15 wani dinayi.
